title: A Pleasure to Die For
description:
Setsuko Shimazaki has lived a dull and lonely life. On her deathbed she wishes to relive her life again so she can experience love and pleasure. Unbelievably her wish becomes true! 

Given a second chance at life she sets out in search of love but discovers that she might be finding pleasure before she can find love.

matches.title: Tiny Evils chans! -Mujaki de Zankoku na Shoujo-tachi no Ecchi na Tanpenshuu-
Onii-chan Nekomimi wa Osuki desu ka?
